directions: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Cook tempeh in the hot oil until browned, 2 to 3 minutes per side. Drizzle tamari over cooked tempeh.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, or more as needed
1 (8 ounce) package tempeh, cut into 1/8-inch thick strips
2 dashes tamari, or more to taste
title: Tempeh Bacon
